data.name: Mail Sender
data.xml_template:
<route  id="{{source}}">
    <from uri="direct:{{source}}"/>
    {{applyUnmarshal input_format input_format_options}}
{{#if (not_empty attachments)}}
    <setBody>
        <groovy>
<![CDATA[
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper;
import groovy.json.JsonBuilder;

def jsonSlurper = new JsonSlurper();

def parsedDocuments = [:]
def counter = 0;
for (document in {{groovyList attachments}}) {
    parsedDocuments[counter++] = document
}
parsedDocuments = new JsonBuilder(parsedDocuments).toPrettyString()

{{#if (eq contentType "text/html")}}
def json = jsonSlurper.parseText """{ "body": "{{safe message_html}}", "documents": $parsedDocuments }"""
{{/if}}
{{#if (eq contentType "text/plain")}}
def json = jsonSlurper.parseText """{ "body": "{{safe message_text}}", "documents": $parsedDocuments }"""
{{/if}}

return [
    body: json["body"],
    documents: json["documents"]
    ]
]]>
        </groovy>
    </setBody>
    <marshal>
        <json/>
    </marshal>
    <process ref="attachments"/>
    {{/if}}
{{#if (ne contentType "auto")}}
    <setHeader name="contentType">
        <constant>
            {{contentType}}
        </constant>
    </setHeader>
    {{/if}}
    <toD uri="{{type}}://{{hostname}}:{{port}}{{querystring query_params}}"/>
</route>
